input: Execute a batch request to update a lock request's user status and fetch details of another lock request simultaneously.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

PATCH /BankCustomerLockRequests/105 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"UserStatusCode":"3"}

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCustomerLockRequests/210 HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator--
